languages.text: "Ее ждут перемены". {n}Кибелла рассекает воздух рукой.{/n} "Странствия подле тебя {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}многое{/d} открыли мне. Мы слишком долго таились в тенях! Потому мы не предотвратили злодеяния Немезита и заговор генетических выродков. Потому не уберегли Домин'Теодору. И я не позволю этому повториться с тобой! Кровавая паутина протянет свои нити из теней и впитает новую кровь".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибелла рассекает воздух рукой.{/n} "Мы слишком долго таились в тенях! Потому не успели прийти на помощь Эним Теодоре. Потому не смогли предотвратить беспорядки Немезита и заговор анафем. Пришло время Кровавой паутине выйти на свет и впитать в себя новую кровь".

languages.text: "Change lies ahead." {n}Kibellah cuts the air with her palm.{/n} "Travelling with you has given me {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}many insights{/d}. We have been lurking in the shadows for too long! That was why we failed to prevent Nemesite's crimes or foil the abominations' plot. That was why we failed to protect Domin'Theodora. And I will not let anything like that happen to you! The Bloodspun Web will stretch its threads from out of the shadows and absorb new blood."
languages.original_text: "Ее ждут перемены". {n}Кибелла рассекает воздух рукой.{/n} "Странствия подле тебя {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}многое{/d} открыли мне. Мы слишком долго таились в тенях! Потому мы не предотвратили злодеяния Немезита и заговор генетических выродков. Потому не уберегли Домин'Теодору. И я не позволю этому повториться с тобой! Кровавая паутина протянет свои нити из теней и впитает новую кровь".

traits.locale_text: "It is headed for changes." {n}Kibellah cuts the air with her palm.{/n} "Travelling with you has given me many insights. We had been lurking in the shadows for too long! That was why we failed to prevent Nemesite's crimes or foil the anathemas' plot. That was why we failed to protect Enim'Theodora. And I will not let that happen again with you! The Bloodspun Web will stretch its threads from out of the shadows and absorb new blood."

And I will not let anything like that happen to you! The Bloodspun Web will stretch its threads from out of the shadows and absorb new blood."

languages.text: « Le temps du changement est arrivé, {n}répond Kibellah en tranchant l'air de sa paume.{/n} Voyager à vos côtés a élargi le champ de {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}mes horizons{/d}. Nous rôdons dans les ombres depuis bien trop longtemps ! C'est pour cela que nous n'avons pas réussi à prévenir les crimes de Némésite ou à déjouer le complot des abominations. C'est pour cela que nous n'avons pas réussi à protéger Domin'Théodora. Mais je ne vous laisserai pas connaître le même sort ! La Toile de Sang tissera de nouveaux fils à la lumière du jour et elle se gorgera d'un sang neuf. »
languages.original_text: "Change lies ahead." {n}Kibellah cuts the air with her palm.{/n} "Travelling with you has given me {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}many insights{/d}. We have been lurking in the shadows for too long! That was why we failed to prevent Nemesite's crimes or foil the abominations' plot. That was why we failed to protect Domin'Theodora. And I will not let anything like that happen to you! The Bloodspun Web will stretch its threads from out of the shadows and absorb new blood."

traits.locale_text: « Le temps du changement est arrivé, {n}répond Kibellah en tranchant l'air de sa paume.{/n} Voyager à vos côtés a élargi le champ de {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}mes horizons{/d}. Nous rôdons dans les ombres depuis bien trop longtemps ! C'est pour cela que nous n'avons pas réussi à prévenir les crimes de Némésite ou à déjouer le complot des abominations. C'est pour cela que nous n'avons pas réussi à protéger Domin'Théodora. Mais je ne vous laisserai pas connaître le même sort ! La Toile de Sang tissera de nouveaux fils à la lumière du jour et elle se gorgera d'un sang neuf. »

languages.text: «Se avecinan cambios». {n}Kibellah corta el aire con la palma de la mano.{/n} «Viajar con usted me ha dado {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}muchas ideas{/d}. ¡Llevamos mucho tiempo en las sombras! Por eso no pudimos evitar los crímenes de Nemesitio ni frustrar el complot de las abominaciones. Por eso no pudimos proteger a la Domin'Theodora. ¡No pienso dejar que a usted le ocurra algo parecido! La Red Sanguinolenta va a sacar sus hilos de las sombras para absorber sangre nueva».
languages.original_text: "Change lies ahead." {n}Kibellah cuts the air with her palm.{/n} "Travelling with you has given me {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}many insights{/d}. We have been lurking in the shadows for too long! That was why we failed to prevent Nemesite's crimes or foil the abominations' plot. That was why we failed to protect Domin'Theodora. And I will not let anything like that happen to you! The Bloodspun Web will stretch its threads from out of the shadows and absorb new blood."

traits.locale_text: «Se avecinan cambios». {n}Kibellah corta el aire con la palma de la mano.{/n} «Viajar con usted me ha dado {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}muchas ideas{/d}. ¡Llevamos mucho tiempo en las sombras! Por eso no pudimos evitar los crímenes de Nemesitio ni frustrar el complot de las abominaciones. Por eso no pudimos proteger a la Domin'Theodora. ¡No pienso dejar que a usted le ocurra algo parecido! La Red Sanguinolenta va a sacar sus hilos de las sombras para absorber sangre nueva».

languages.text: 「変化が訪れようとしています」{n}キベラは手のひらで宙を切る。{/n}「あなたとの旅は、我に{d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}多くの洞察{/d}を与えてくれた。我らはあまりに長く影に潜んでいました！だからネメサイトの事件を防ぐことも、忌まわしきあの者達の企てを阻止することも叶わなかったのです。ドミン・シオドーラを守れなかったのもそのせい。あなたをあの方のような目には遭わせません！ブラッドスパン・ウェブは影から糸を伸ばし、新たな血に染まるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Change lies ahead." {n}Kibellah cuts the air with her palm.{/n} "Travelling with you has given me {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}many insights{/d}. We have been lurking in the shadows for too long! That was why we failed to prevent Nemesite's crimes or foil the abominations' plot. That was why we failed to protect Domin'Theodora. And I will not let anything like that happen to you! The Bloodspun Web will stretch its threads from out of the shadows and absorb new blood."

traits.locale_text: 「変化が訪れようとしています」{n}キベラは手のひらで宙を切る。{/n}「あなたとの旅は、我に{d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}多くの洞察{/d}を与えてくれた。我らはあまりに長く影に潜んでいました！だからネメサイトの事件を防ぐことも、忌まわしきあの者達の企てを阻止することも叶わなかったのです。ドミン・シオドーラを守れなかったのもそのせい。あなたをあの方のような目には遭わせません！ブラッドスパン・ウェブは影から糸を伸ばし、新たな血に染まるでしょう」

languages.text: “变革即将到来。”{n}绮贝菈用手掌划开了空气。{/n}“与你共同度过的旅程为我带来了{d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}许多启发{/d}。我们在阴影之中蛰伏太久了！正因如此，我们未能阻止涅墨斯特的罪行，未能挫败那些怪物的阴谋，也未能保护好秘者西奥多拉。我决不能让你也落得同样的下场！织血罗网准备将丝线伸到阴影之外，吸收新鲜血液。”
languages.original_text: "Change lies ahead." {n}Kibellah cuts the air with her palm.{/n} "Travelling with you has given me {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}many insights{/d}. We have been lurking in the shadows for too long! That was why we failed to prevent Nemesite's crimes or foil the abominations' plot. That was why we failed to protect Domin'Theodora. And I will not let anything like that happen to you! The Bloodspun Web will stretch its threads from out of the shadows and absorb new blood."

traits.locale_text: “变革即将到来。”{n}绮贝菈用手掌划开了空气。{/n}“与你共同度过的旅程为我带来了{d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}许多启发{/d}。我们在阴影之中蛰伏太久了！正因如此，我们未能阻止涅墨斯特的罪行，未能挫败那些怪物的阴谋，也未能保护好秘者西奥多拉。我决不能让你也落得同样的下场！织血罗网准备将丝线伸到阴影之外，吸收新鲜血液。”

languages.text: "Änderungen warten." {n}Kibellah durchtrennt mit ihrer Hand die Luft.{/n} "Mit Euch zu reisen, hat mir {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}viele Erkenntnisse{/d} geschenkt. Wir verstecken uns schon zu lange in den Schatten! Darum konnten wir Nemesits Verbrechen nicht verhindern und den Plan der Abscheulichkeiten nicht vereiteln. Darum konnten wir Domin'Theodora nicht beschützen. Und ich lasse nicht zu, dass Euch etwas Ähnliches geschieht! Das Blutgesponnene Netz streckt seine Fäden aus den Schatten und absorbiert neues Blut."
languages.original_text: "Change lies ahead." {n}Kibellah cuts the air with her palm.{/n} "Travelling with you has given me {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}many insights{/d}. We have been lurking in the shadows for too long! That was why we failed to prevent Nemesite's crimes or foil the abominations' plot. That was why we failed to protect Domin'Theodora. And I will not let anything like that happen to you! The Bloodspun Web will stretch its threads from out of the shadows and absorb new blood."

traits.locale_text: "Änderungen warten." {n}Kibellah durchtrennt mit ihrer Hand die Luft.{/n} "Mit Euch zu reisen, hat mir {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}viele Erkenntnisse{/d} geschenkt. Wir verstecken uns schon zu lange in den Schatten! Darum konnten wir Nemesits Verbrechen nicht verhindern und den Plan der Abscheulichkeiten nicht vereiteln. Darum konnten wir Domin'Theodora nicht beschützen. Und ich lasse nicht zu, dass Euch etwas Ähnliches geschieht! Das Blutgesponnene Netz streckt seine Fäden aus den Schatten und absorbiert neues Blut."

languages.text: "Değişim bizi bekliyor." {n}Kibellah, elini havada sallıyor.{/n} "Seninle seyahat etmek, bana {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}pek çok içgörü{/d} bahşetti. Nicedir sinsice gölgelerde geziniyorduk! Bundandır ki ne Nemezit'in suçlarına engel olabildik ne de ucubelerin kumpaslarını sekteye uğratabildik. İşte bu yüzden Domin'Theodora'yı koruyamadık. Böyle bir şeyin senin başına gelmesine izin vermeyeceğim! Kanipi Ağı, gölgelerden ipliklerini uzatarak yeni kanlar özümseyecek."
languages.original_text: "Change lies ahead." {n}Kibellah cuts the air with her palm.{/n} "Travelling with you has given me {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Fanatic}many insights{/d}. We have been lurking in the shadows for too long! That was why we failed to prevent Nemesite's crimes or foil the abominations' plot. That was why we failed to protect Domin'Theodora. And I will not let anything like that happen to you! The Bloodspun Web will stretch its threads from out of the shadows and absorb new blood."
